title: Self-Monitoring-Based Mathematics Learning Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational mathematics concepts (secondary education level)
context.additional_context: A customized program for high school students preparing for professional careers. Construction of a VR simulation environment for analyzing individual learning patterns.

learning_goals: Learners can set weekly learning goals using a self-assessment checklist with 85%+ accuracy.
Learners can write and request feedback on three or more metacognitive reflection journals through VR simulation tasks.
Learners can improve conceptual understanding by 70%+ through online quizzes (20 items) and peer assessments (2 instances).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
